cluster_relations.rel_desc: General relativity is cited as an example of a gravitational theory tested using black holes.

args.justification: All four relations express a category/instance membership link (either instance_of or its inverse has_member). This is better modeled under a broad CLASSIFICATION group rather than IDENTITY, since the subject and object are not co-referential but stand in a type–instance or collection–member relation.

executed_decisions.justification: All four relations express a category/instance membership link (either instance_of or its inverse has_member).
